name: Spaghetti with Tomato Sauce
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the spaghetti until al dente. In a separate pan, heat olive oil over medium heat and add chopped tomatoes. Simmer for 10 minutes, season with salt, then drain the pasta and mix it with the sauce before serving.

name: Garlic and Oil Pasta
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water. Thinly slice the garlic and gently heat it in olive oil until fragrant. Add chili flakes, then toss the drained pasta into the pan and mix well.

name: Scrambled Eggs
instructions: Crack the eggs into a bowl and beat them lightly with salt. Melt butter in a pan over low heat, add the eggs, and stir continuously until soft and creamy.

name: Cheese Omelette
instructions: Beat the eggs with salt. Melt butter in a pan, pour in the eggs, and cook gently. Add grated cheese to one side, fold the omelette, and cook until the cheese melts.

name: Classic Pancakes
instructions: Mix eggs, milk, flour, and sugar until smooth. Heat a non-stick pan and pour small amounts of batter. Cook until bubbles form, flip, and cook until golden.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter the bread slices on the outside, place cheese in between, and grill in a pan over medium heat until golden brown and the cheese is melted.

name: Simple Green Salad
instructions: Wash and dry the lettuce thoroughly. Tear into pieces, season with olive oil and salt, and toss gently before serving.

name: Boiled Rice
instructions: Bring water to a boil with salt. Add rice, cook until tender, drain excess water, and let rest before serving.

name: Rice with Tomato Sauce
instructions: Cook the rice in salted water. Prepare a tomato sauce by simmering tomatoes with olive oil and salt, then mix with the cooked rice.

name: Pasta with Butter
instructions: Cook pasta in salted boiling water. Drain and immediately mix with butter until melted and evenly distributed.

name: Fried Potatoes
instructions: Peel and slice the potatoes. Heat olive oil in a pan and fry the potatoes until golden and crispy. Season with salt before serving.

name: Baked Potatoes
instructions: Preheat the oven to 200°C. Cut potatoes into wedges, toss with olive oil and salt, and bake for 40 minutes until crispy.

name: Boiled Eggs
instructions: Place eggs in a pot, cover with water, and bring to a boil. Cook for 7–9 minutes, then cool under running water and peel.

name: Egg Fried Rice
instructions: Cook the rice in advance. Heat oil in a pan, scramble the eggs, add rice, season with salt, and stir-fry for several minutes.

name: Tomato Sandwich
instructions: Slice tomatoes and season with salt and olive oil. Place between slices of bread and press gently.

name: Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Place cheese between bread slices and serve cold or lightly toasted.

name: Vegetable Soup
instructions: Chop vegetables, place them in a pot with water and salt, and simmer for 30 minutes until tender.

name: Mashed Potatoes
instructions: Boil potatoes until soft, mash them with butter and salt until smooth and creamy.

name: Pasta Salad
instructions: Cook pasta, let it cool, then mix with chopped tomatoes and olive oil.

name: Rice Salad
instructions: Cook rice, allow it to cool, then mix with tomatoes and olive oil.

name: Toast with Eggs
instructions: Toast the bread. Fry eggs in butter and serve on top of the toast.

name: Butter Toast
instructions: Toast the bread and spread butter evenly while warm.

name: Simple Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs with salt, cook gently in butter, and fold before serving.

name: Rice with Butter
instructions: Cook rice and mix with butter and salt while still hot.

name: Pasta with Cheese
instructions: Cook pasta, drain, and mix immediately with grated cheese and salt.

name: Cheese and Tomato Plate
instructions: Slice cheese and tomatoes and arrange them on a plate.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, add vegetables, and stir-fry until tender. Season with salt.

name: Rice with Vegetables
instructions: Cook rice and vegetables separately, then mix and season with salt.

name: Egg and Cheese Toast
instructions: Toast bread, cook eggs, add cheese, and assemble on the toast.

name: Simple Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta in salted boiling water and serve plain.

name: Cold Rice Bowl
instructions: Cook rice, let it cool, and season with olive oil and salt.

name: Egg Salad
instructions: Boil eggs, chop them, and season with olive oil and salt.

name: Cheese Omelette Deluxe
instructions: Cook eggs slowly in butter, add cheese, fold, and finish cooking gently.

name: Pan Fried Bread
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and fry bread slices until crispy on both sides.

name: Rice and Eggs Bowl
instructions: Serve cooked rice topped with softly cooked eggs and salt.

name: Vegetable Rice Soup
instructions: Simmer rice and vegetables in water with salt until soft.

name: Potato and Egg Skillet
instructions: Fry potatoes in oil until golden, add eggs, and cook until set.

name: Cheese Rice
instructions: Mix hot cooked rice with cheese and salt until melted.

name: Warm Vegetable Bowl
instructions: Cook vegetables in olive oil and season lightly before serving.

name: Egg and Bread Plate
instructions: Cook eggs to preference and serve with bread.
